narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this announced prelicense inspection. 
This is a 1st prelicense Inspection for a Class “B” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The facility is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. A copy of your 
license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license within 30 days, 
please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
End Section
